beans.description:
This adaptor does the following... * reads input from the console * attemps to convert input (expects two integers separated with a comma) to a map * uses a Web Service enrichment processor to call a Web service that sums the numbers. * writes output from the enrichment processor to the console.
It is designed to illustrate the basic structure of an adaptor that uses a Web service enrichment processor.
Run it like this...
1) Start the Web service endpoint:
java SumWSEndpoint
2) Run the adaptor:
java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config enrich-processor.xml
You need the following in your classpath
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar lib/opt/activation.jar sum-ws-endpoint.jar
To test the adaptor, type two integers separated with a comma: 3,4
